description: Split songs, demix music, and separate stems with our AI-based tool: free, private, and unlimited use directly in your browser.
title: free-music-demixer
introduction: Free AI-powered music demixer that effortlessly splits your songs into individual stems - vocals, bass, drums, and melody - using the latest AI model. It runs locally on your computer, ensuring unlimited usage without any restrictions.
features: Splits songs into individual stems: vocals, bass, drums, and melody
Powered by Demucs Hybrid Transformer AI model
Free to use and doesn't store your data
Supports MAX MEMORY option for faster demixing and longer songs
Outputs are stereo wav files @ 44100 Hz
targetPeople: Musicians, audio engineers, and music enthusiasts

faqs.question: What stems can be extracted using the free version?
faqs.answer: The free version can extract vocals, bass, drums, and melody.

faqs.question: Does the application store my data?
faqs.answer: No, all processing is done in your browser and your files are never uploaded anywhere.

faqs.question: Is there a paid version available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a PRO subscription that unlocks more instruments and stems (piano + guitar) and higher-quality AI models.

faqs.question: What should I do if the application crashes?
faqs.answer: Try a different MAX MEMORY setting (lower or higher).

faqs.question: What audio formats are supported for input?
faqs.answer: Input files can be almost any audio format, but the outputs are always stereo wav files @ 44100 Hz.
